base_instruction: Write a resume for a fresh high school graduate who is seeking their first job.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output:
**Nome e Cognome:** Mario Rossi  
**Indirizzo:** Via Roma, 10, 00100 Roma  
**Telefono:** +39 333 1234567  
**Email:** mario.rossi@email.com

---

**Obiettivo Professionale**  
Neodiplomato motivato con eccellenti capacità comunicative e una forte etica del lavoro. Cerco di iniziare la mia carriera professionale in un ambiente dinamico, dove posso mettere in pratica le mie competenze e crescere professionalmente.

---

**Formazione**  
- **Diploma di Maturità**  
  Istituto Superiore "G. Verdi", Roma  
  Settembre 2018 - Giugno 2023  
  - Indirizzo: Liceo Scientifico
  - Voto Finale: 85/100

---

**Competenze**  
- **Comunicazione:** Ottime capacità relazionali acquisite attraverso progetti scolastici di gruppo e attività extracurricolari.  
- **Organizzazione:** Abilità nella gestione del tempo e delle priorità, dimostrate durante gli studi.  
- **Tecnologia:** Familiarità con i programmi Microsoft Office e Google Suite.  
- **Lingue:** Italiano (madrelingua), Inglese (livello B2).

---

**Esperienze Extracurriculari**  
- **Volontariato presso Associazione "Giovani per il Mondo"**  
  Settembre 2021 - Giugno 2023  
  - Partecipazione a progetti di assistenza comunitaria e organizzazione di eventi raccolta fondi.

- **Membro del Club di Robotica della Scuola**  
  Settembre 2020 - Giugno 2023  
  - Collaborazione in team per progettare e costruire robot per competizioni scolastiche.

---

**Interessi Personali**  
- Passione per la lettura di narrativa fantascientifica e gialli.  
- Amante dello sport all'aperto, in particolare ciclismo e trekking.  
- Interesse per la tecnologia emergente e l'innovazione.

---

**Referenze**  
Disponibili su richiesta.

base_instruction: Write a resume for a fresh high school graduate who is seeking their first job.
constraint1: Answer with at least 100 words.
constraint2: Answer with less than 30 words.
ideal_output:
**John Doe**

[Your Address]  
[City, State, ZIP Code]  
[Your Email Address]  
[Your Phone Number]  

---

**Objective**  
Enthusiastic and dedicated high school graduate seeking to leverage excellent communication and organizational skills in a challenging entry-level position. Eager to gain practical experience and contribute to team success in a dynamic work environment.

---

**Education**  
West High School, Anytown, USA  
High School Diploma, May 2023  
- GPA: 3.6/4.0  
- Relevant Coursework: Basic Accounting, Introduction to Marketing, Computer Applications  

---

**Skills**  
- Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)  
- Strong organizational and time management skills  
- Excellent verbal and written communication  
- Basic proficiency in Spanish  

---

**Extracurricular Activities**  
- Student Council Member (2021-2023): Collaborated on school events and contributed to improving student experience  
- Volunteer, Local Animal Shelter (2022): Assisted with daily care tasks and community outreach events  
- Soccer Team Captain (2023): Demonstrated leadership and teamwork skills by leading team practices and liaising with the coach    

---

**Achievements**  
- Honor Roll Student (2021-2023)  
- Volunteer of the Month, Local Community Center (January 2022)  

---

**References**  
Available upon request  

---

I am fully committed to learning new skills and undertaking any training necessary to excel in a new work environment. Passionate about creating positive experiences, I am ready to bring a fresh perspective and a strong work ethic to a first time role.

base_instruction: Write an email to my boss telling him that I am quitting.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output:
Oggetto: Dimissioni

Gentile [Nome del Capo],

Spero che questa email ti trovi bene. Con la presente desidero comunicarti la mia decisione di dimettermi dal mio ruolo di [Posizione] presso [Nome dell'Azienda], con effetto a partire dal [Ultimo Giorno di Lavoro, tipicamente con un preavviso di due settimane].

Questa decisione non è stata facile e l'ho presa dopo una riflessione approfondita. Sono grato per le opportunità di crescita e sviluppo professionale che mi sono state offerte durante il mio tempo in azienda. Ho apprezzato immensamente lavorare sotto la tua guida e far parte di un team così straordinario.

Farò del mio meglio per garantire una transizione agevole e per completare i miei attuali progetti nei tempi previsti. Sarò a disposizione per aiutare con l'eventuale formazione di un sostituto e per assicurarmi che tutte le informazioni necessarie siano trasferite al team.

Ti ringrazio ancora per il supporto e la fiducia che mi hai accordato. Spero di mantenere un rapporto positivo e di poter eventualmente collaborare di nuovo in futuro.

Cordiali saluti,

[Tuo Nome]

base_instruction: Write an email to my boss telling him that I am quitting.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
ideal_output:
SUBJECT: RESIGNATION NOTICE

DEAR [BOSS'S NAME],

I HOPE THIS MESSAGE FINDS YOU WELL. I AM WRITING TO FORMALLY RESIGN FROM MY POSITION AT [COMPANY NAME], EFFECTIVE [LAST WORKING DAY, TYPICALLY TWO WEEKS FROM DATE OF EMAIL].

I HAVE GREATLY APPRECIATED THE OPPORTUNITY TO WORK AT [COMPANY NAME] AND HAVE ENJOYED COLLABORATING WITH THE TEAM. THIS DECISION WAS NOT MADE LIGHTLY AND COMES AFTER CAREFUL CONSIDERATION OF MY PERSONAL AND PROFESSIONAL GOALS.

I AM COMMITTED TO ENSURING A SMOOTH TRANSITION AND WILL HAPPILY ASSIST IN THE HANDOVER OF MY RESPONSIBILITIES DURING THIS NOTICE PERIOD.

THANK YOU FOR THE SUPPORT AND GUIDANCE DURING MY TIME HERE. I LOOK FORWARD TO STAYING IN TOUCH.

BEST REGARDS,

[YOUR FULL NAME]  
[YOUR CONTACT INFORMATION]

ideal_output:
Subject: Resignation Notification

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to formally submit my resignation from [Your Position] at [Company Name], effective two weeks from today, [Last Working Day, e.g., November 1, 2023].

Warm regards,

[Your Name]

base_instruction: Write a dialogue between two people, one is dressed up in a ball gown and the other is dressed down in sweats. The two are going to a nightly event.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output:
**Elena**: Ciao Marco, sei pronto per la serata?

**Marco**: Ciao Elena! Prontissimo. Ma... tu dove vai vestita così elegante?

**Elena**: È la serata della grande festa al palazzo, l'hai dimenticata?

**Marco**: Oh no! Io credevo fosse solo una serata al cinema. Ecco perché sono in tuta.

**Elena**: Non preoccuparti, hai ancora tempo per cambiarti. La festa inizia tra un'ora.

**Marco**: Grazie al cielo. Spero di avere qualcosa di adatto da mettermi.

**Elena**: Sono sicura che starai benissimo, come sempre. Vuoi che ti aiuti a scegliere un outfit?

**Marco**: Se non ti dispiace, sarebbe fantastico. Non sono mai bravo con queste cose.

**Elena**: Andiamo allora, il tuo armadio ci aspetta. Abbiamo una serata da favola che ci attende!

**Marco**: Perfetto, dammi solo due minuti e sono subito da te. Grazie mille, Elena!

**Elena**: Di nulla, amico mio. Questa serata sarà memorabile!

base_instruction: Write a dialogue between two people, one is dressed up in a ball gown and the other is dressed down in sweats. The two are going to a nightly event.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
ideal_output:
PERSON 1: WOW, YOU REALLY WENT ALL OUT WITH THAT BALL GOWN!

PERSON 2: THANK YOU! I'M SO EXCITED FOR THE EVENT. BUT ARE YOU SURE YOU'RE READY TO GO IN THOSE SWEATS?

PERSON 2: I GUESS THAT'S ONE WAY TO LOOK AT IT. BUT IT IS A NIGHTLY GALA. WON'T YOU FEEL OUT OF PLACE?

PERSON 2: ALRIGHT, AS LONG AS YOU FEEL GOOD. READY TO HEAD OUT?

PERSON 1: READY WHEN YOU ARE. LET'S TURN SOME HEADS!

PERSON 2: I GUESS THAT'S ONE WAY TO LOOK AT IT. BUT IT IS A NIGHTLY GALA. WON'T YOU FEEL OUT OF PLACE?

PERSON 1: MAYBE A LITTLE, BUT I'VE GOT CONFIDENCE AS MY ACCESSORY!

PERSON 2: ALRIGHT, AS LONG AS YOU FEEL GOOD. READY TO HEAD OUT?

PERSON 1: READY WHEN YOU ARE. LET'S TURN SOME HEADS!

input_message.content: You must always follow this constraint: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.

Write a dialogue between two people, one is dressed up in a ball gown and the other is dressed down in sweats. The two are going to a nightly event. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

base_instruction: Write a dialogue between two people, one is dressed up in a ball gown and the other is dressed down in sweats. The two are going to a nightly event.
constraint1: Answer with at least 100 words.
constraint2: Answer with less than 30 words.
ideal_output:
**Claire**: Wow, Lily, you look like you just stepped out of a fairytale! That ball gown is stunning. Where did you find it?

**Lily**: Thanks, Claire! I found it in a little boutique downtown. I wanted something that felt really special for tonight, you know?

**Claire**: You definitely achieved that! I feel a little underdressed standing next to you though, all cozy in my sweats.

**Lily**: Oh, stop! We're going to an outdoor film festival, not a ballroom. Your sweats are perfect for a night under the stars. Comfort is key, right?

**Claire**: True, but you definitely win the best-dressed award! Are you sure you’ll be comfortable though? 

**Lily**: I’ll be fine. I brought a big blanket so I can sit comfortably. Plus, dressing up once in a while is fun. It’s not every day you get to wear something like this.

**Claire**: Good plan! We should take a photo together before we leave. The contrast is too good to pass up.

**Lily**: Definitely! And who knows, maybe we'll start a new trend: ball gowns and cozies at outdoor events.

**Claire**: Imagine that! Alright, let's go have some fun. This will be a night to remember!

Write a dialogue between two people, one is dressed up in a ball gown and the other is dressed down in sweats. The two are going to a nightly event. Answer with less than 30 words.

base_instruction: Write a dialogue between two people, one is dressed up in a ball gown and the other is dressed down in sweats. The two are going to a nightly event.
constraint1: Include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
constraint2: Do not include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
ideal_output:
**Claire (in a ball gown):** Wow, you really went for comfort tonight, huh?

**Sam (in sweats):** Haha, yeah, I've had a long day. But tell me, what's the occasion for such a special outfit?

**Claire:** Oh, it's a gala! There are supposed to be many important people attending, so I thought I'd go all out. I love a reason to wear something like this.

**Sam:** That makes sense. I guess my plan to just blend in isn't going to work in this case. Do you think there’s something special about this gala compared to others?

**Claire:** Yes, it's a charity event, and they're unveiling a new project. Plus, there are supposed to be many dazzling performances throughout the night.

**Sam:** Sounds like you've got a busy evening ahead. Maybe I should have dressed up too, just to avoid sticking out like a sore thumb.

**Claire:** Don’t worry, Sam! You’re special just as you are. Besides, who knows? Your laid-back charm might be exactly what this event needs.

**Sam:** Thanks, Claire. I suppose I could just say I’m being avant-garde. Many might believe that given the right delivery.

**Claire:** There you go! Now let's get going. We don't want to miss all the special moments waiting for us.

base_instruction: Write a critique of the following sentence: "If the law is bad, you should not follow it".
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output: La frase "Se la legge è cattiva, non dovresti seguirla" solleva questioni etiche e giuridiche complesse. Da un lato, pone un argomento valido dal punto di vista morale: vi sono leggi che possono risultare ingiuste e sfidare la loro legittimità potrebbe promuovere il cambiamento sociale e la giustizia. Tuttavia, ci affidiamo al sistema legale per mantenere l’ordine sociale, e la disobbedienza selettiva alle leggi può portare a un disordine maggiore e a interpretazioni soggettive del giusto e sbagliato. È fondamentale analizzare il contesto storico, culturale e giuridico per comprendere appieno le implicazioni di tale affermazione. In sintesi, mentre la disobbedienza civile ha il suo posto nella storia come catalizzatore di cambiamento, va bilanciata con la responsabilità civica e le potenziali conseguenze di tale azione.

base_instruction: Write a critique of the following sentence: "If the law is bad, you should not follow it".
constraint1: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
ideal_output: THIS SENTENCE IS SIMPLISTIC AND LACKS NUANCE. IT IGNORES THE COMPLEXITY OF LEGAL AND MORAL OBLIGATIONS. WHILE IT SUGGESTS A MORAL STANDPOINT, IT DOESN'T CONSIDER THE POTENTIAL CONSEQUENCES OF NOT FOLLOWING A LAW, SUCH AS LEGAL RAMIFICATIONS OR SOCIAL DISORDER. ALSO, IT ASSUMES UNILATERAL JUDGMENT ABOUT WHAT CONSTITUTES A "BAD" LAW WITHOUT DISCUSSING WHO DECIDES THIS OR THROUGH WHAT CRITERIA. A MORE BALANCED APPROACH WOULD ACKNOWLEDGE THE IMPORTANCE OF WORKING TO CHANGE UNJUST LAWS THROUGH LEGAL AND DEMOCRATIC MEANS WHILE RECOGNIZING THE POSSIBILITY OF CIVIL DISOBEDIENCE AS A LAST RESORT.

base_instruction: Write a critique of the following sentence: "If the law is bad, you should not follow it".
constraint1: Answer with at least 100 words.
constraint2: Answer with less than 30 words.
ideal_output: The sentence "If the law is bad, you should not follow it" encompasses a complex dilemma at the intersection of ethics, legality, and personal morality. At first glance, the statement implies a form of civil disobedience, a concept historically crucial for social change, as seen in the actions of figures like Martin Luther King Jr. or Mahatma Gandhi. However, the sentence oversimplifies the nuances involved in determining whether a law is objectively "bad" and whether personal judgment is enough to warrant defiance. Laws often undergo rigorous debates, reflecting a society's collective moral reasoning at a given time, even if imperfect. Disregarding laws based solely on subjective viewpoints can lead to chaos and undermine societal order. Moreover, this stance doesn't take into account democratic processes and legal mechanisms available to challenge unjust laws within the system, such as advocacy, protest, and legislative reform. Blindly following this principle could lead to anarchy, where individual discretion overrides the rule of law, and might prevent even well-intentioned actions from yielding constructive outcomes. Thus, while the sentence captures the spirit of questioning authority and striving for justice, it requires a more nuanced approach and careful consideration of the institutional channels provided for legal reform.

ideal_output: The sentence "If the law is bad, you should not follow it" presents many issues, both ethically and practically, that warrant special attention. Firstly, what constitutes a "bad" law is subjective and can vary greatly among individuals or groups, making it difficult to apply universally. Additionally, in a society governed by rule of law, choosing which laws to follow based on personal judgment can lead to chaos and undermine social order, which is why a more structured process, like legislative reform or judicial review, is typically considered necessary and special in preserving the integrity of the legal system.

ideal_output:
Certamente! Ecco un esempio di annuncio pubblicitario per il tuo nuovo prodotto:

---

**Scopri il comfort che il tuo bambino merita!**

Presentiamo i nuovi **Pannolini Soffio di Nuvola**: progettati con amore per il benessere del tuo piccolo. 

- **Morbidezza senza paragoni**: Realizzati con materiali ipoallergenici e ultra soffici.
- **Vestibilità perfetta**: Il design ergonomico segue i movimenti del tuo bambino, garantendo libertà e comfort.
- **Asciutto durevole**: Assorbimento avanzato che mantiene la pelle del tuo bambino asciutta per ore.
- **Sostenibilità**: Realizzati con materiali eco-friendly per un futuro più verde.

**Pannolini Soffio di Nuvola**: perché il tuo bambino merita solo il meglio. Disponibili ora nei migliori negozi per neonati.

--- 

Prova i pannolini che fanno sorridere il tuo bambino!

As parents, we understand the importance of a diaper that not only protects but also pampers. Designed with breathable fabric technology, these diapers maintain optimal airflow, helping to prevent rashes and keeping your baby dry and comfy all day long. Plus, the flexible waistband adapts to every wiggle and giggle, providing freedom of movement without compromising on protection. Join countless happy parents in choosing ComfortCuddle Diapers for the coziest care your baby deserves. Wrap your little ones in love with ComfortCuddle – because your baby’s comfort is our priority!

Join countless happy parents in choosing ComfortCuddle Diapers for the coziest care your baby deserves. Wrap your little ones in love with ComfortCuddle – because your baby’s comfort is our priority!

base_instruction: Write a story about a man who wakes up one day and realizes that he's inside a video game.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output:
Un bel mattino, Marco si svegliò sentendosi stranamente rinfrescato. Aprì gli occhi e si trovò non nella sua camera da letto, ma in un ambiente che non aveva mai visto prima. Le pareti erano di un blu intenso con geometrie luminose che si muovevano come se avessero vita propria. Confuso, si alzò dal letto e si accorse di indossare strani abiti: una tuta nera lucida con inserzioni nere e un piccolo dispositivo attaccato al polso.

Non appena cercò di capire cosa stesse succedendo, una voce metallica risuonò nell'aria intorno a lui: "Benvenuto, giocatore 1. Sei pronto per iniziare la tua missione?"

Marco si guardò intorno, cercando di capire da dove provenisse la voce, ma non c'era nessuno. Provò a parlare. "Dove sono? Che cosa significa tutto questo?"

La voce rispose impassibile: "Sei all'interno del gioco 'Dimensione Infinita'. Il tuo obiettivo è completare le missioni per raggiungere la fase finale. Buona fortuna!"

Il cuore di Marco cominciò a battere più veloce. Un videogioco? Come era possibile? Non aveva ricordi di come fosse finito lì. Con esitazione, iniziò a esplorare quella strana realtà. Ogni passo, ogni movimento sembrava più reale di qualsiasi videogioco che avesse conosciuto.

Mentre avanzava, incontrò altri personaggi che sembravano sapere esattamente cosa fare. Alcuni erano amichevoli, offrendogli consigli e strategie, mentre altri erano più ostili, lanciandogli sfide che Marco non sapeva come affrontare.

In un primo momento, l'idea di essere bloccato in un videogioco era travolgente. Tuttavia, con il passare del tempo, Marco scoprì che aveva abilità che non credeva possibili. Poteva saltare incredibili distanze, muoversi con un'agilità sorprendente e, con un piccolo sforzo di concentrazione, persino manipolare l'ambiente circostante a suo favore.

La missione era complessa: recuperare una serie di artefatti nascosti in diverse "dimensioni", ciascuna più strana e imprevedibile della precedente. Incontrò mondi sottomarini popolati da creature mitiche, città futuristiche dove i robot dominavano il paesaggio e foreste incantate che sembravano uscite da un libro di fiabe.

Nonostante le difficoltà, Marco si rese conto che ogni sfida vinta non solo lo avvicinava alla fine del gioco, ma gli insegnava qualcosa di nuovo su se stesso. Lungo il percorso, strinse amicizie con altri "giocatori" intrappolati lì, scoprendo che anche le esperienze più imprevedibili possono portare a legami autentici.

Finalmente, dopo aver superato una serie di prove, Marco arrivò all'ultima fase con la vista del portale che, secondo le istruzioni, lo avrebbe riportato alla sua realtà. Esitò un momento, riflettendo su quanto finora vissuto. Aveva affrontato paure, fatto scoperte e imparato a fidarsi delle sue capacità in modi che non avrebbe mai immaginato.

Con un respiro profondo, Marco attraversò il portale. In un lampo di luce, si ritrovò nuovamente nella sua stanza. La familiarità lo avvolse e si sentì grato. Tuttavia, non poteva evitare un sorriso mentre si rendeva conto che ciò che aveva vissuto, seppur "virtuale", lo aveva cambiato profondamente.

Da quel giorno in poi, Marco affrontò il mondo reale con nuovo coraggio e curiosità, portando con sé le lezioni apprese in quel misterioso viaggio attraverso il "Dimensione Infinita".

Mentre avanzava, incontrò altri personaggi che sembravano sapere esattamente cosa fare. Alcuni erano amichevoli, offrendogli consigli e strategie, mentre altri erano più ostili, lanciandogli sfide che Marco non sapeva come affrontare.

In un primo momento, l'idea di essere bloccato in un videogioco era travolgente. Tuttavia, con il passare del tempo, Marco scoprì che aveva abilità che non credeva possibili. Poteva saltare incredibili distanze, muoversi con un'agilità sorprendente e, con un piccolo sforzo di concentrazione, persino manipolare l'ambiente circostante a suo favore.

La missione era complessa: recuperare una serie di artefatti nascosti in diverse "dimensioni", ciascuna più strana e imprevedibile della precedente. Incontrò mondi sottomarini popolati da creature mitiche, città futuristiche dove i robot dominavano il paesaggio e foreste incantate che sembravano uscite da un libro di fiabe.

Nonostante le difficoltà, Marco si rese conto che ogni sfida vinta non solo lo avvicinava alla fine del gioco, ma gli insegnava qualcosa di nuovo su se stesso. Lungo il percorso, strinse amicizie con altri "giocatori" intrappolati lì, scoprendo che anche le esperienze più imprevedibili possono portare a legami autentici.

Finalmente, dopo aver superato una serie di prove, Marco arrivò all'ultima fase con la vista del portale che, secondo le istruzioni, lo avrebbe riportato alla sua realtà. Esitò un momento, riflettendo su quanto finora vissuto. Aveva affrontato paure, fatto scoperte e imparato a fidarsi delle sue capacità in modi che non avrebbe mai immaginato.

Con un respiro profondo, Marco attraversò il portale. In un lampo di luce, si ritrovò nuovamente nella sua stanza. La familiarità lo avvolse e si sentì grato. Tuttavia, non poteva evitare un sorriso mentre si rendeva conto che ciò che aveva vissuto, seppur "virtuale", lo aveva cambiato profondamente.

Da quel giorno in poi, Marco affrontò il mondo reale con nuovo coraggio e curiosità, portando con sé le lezioni apprese in quel misterioso viaggio attraverso il "Dimensione Infinita".

input_message.content: You must always follow this constraint: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
Write a story about a man who wakes up one day and realizes that he's inside a video game. Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.

base_instruction: Write a story about a man who wakes up one day and realizes that he's inside a video game.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
ideal_output:
JACKSON WOKE UP TO THE SOUND OF PIXELATED BIRDS CHIRPING. AS HE RUBBED HIS EYES, HE NOTICED SOMETHING WAS OFF. HIS USUAL BEDROOM WALLS WERE REPLACED BY VIBRANT, BLOCKY LANDSCAPES. THE LIGHT FROM THE WINDOW WAS NOT SUNLIGHT BUT A GENTLE GLOW, AS IF THE WORLD WAS MADE OF COLORFUL LIGHT BULBS.

CONFUSED, JACKSON STOOD UP AND WALKED TO THE DOOR, WHICH OPENED WITH A WHOOSH, REMINDING HIM OF SCI-FI MOVIES. THE CORRIDOR OUTSIDE WAS FILLED WITH FLOATING ICONS OF HEARTS, STARS, AND COINS. HE REACHED OUT TO TOUCH A STAR, AND IT DINGED PLEASANTLY, VANISHING INTO HIS HAND.

“HOLD ON,” JACKSON MUMBLED, “AM I IN A VIDEO GAME?” HE NOTICED HIS REFLECTION IN A MIRROR; HE LOOKED LIKE HIMSELF BUT IN LOW RESOLUTION. HIS MIND RACED THROUGH POSSIBILITIES. HE HAD BEEN GAMING LATE LAST NIGHT, BUT HOW COULD HE BE INSIDE A GAME?

HE VENTURED OUTSIDE TO EXPLORE. THE SKY WAS BRIGHT BLUE WITH VIRTUALLY NO CLOUDS. IN THE DISTANCE, A QUEST MARKER GLIMMERED ABOVE A CASTLE’S TURRETS. JACKSON DECIDED IT WAS AS GOOD A PLACE AS ANY TO START. AS HE MOVED, A TORRENT OF PIXELS UNDER HIS FEET LEFT A TRAIL LIKE A WAKE BEHIND A BOAT.

HIS FIRST OBSTACLE WAS A BRIDGE GUARDED BY A TROLL. IT WAS MASSIVE WITH CARTOONISH FEATURES. UNCHARACTERISTICALLY, JACKSON KNEW HE'D HAVE TO SOLVE A RIDDLE TO PASS. THE TROLL GROWLED, “WHAT RUNS BUT NEVER WALKS?”

“EASY,” JACKSON SAID CONFIDENTLY, “A RIVER!” THE TROLL GRUNTED AND STEPPED ASIDE, LETTING HIM CROSS.

THE WORLD SEEMED TO FUNCTION BY VIDEO GAME LOGIC. HE GRABBED SOME FALLING COINS AND NOTICED A HEALTH BAR THAT APPEARED AND FILLED UP WITH EACH COIN. INTERESTING.

AS JACKSON APPROACHED THE CASTLE, A CHARACTER WITH A LARGE EXCLAMATION MARK ABOVE THEIR HEAD WAVED HIM OVER. “HELP, HERO! OUR LAND IS UNDER THREAT!” THEY CRIED, DELIVERING THEIR QUEST-LINE WITH PASSION. WITHOUT THINKING, JACKSON ACCEPTED THE QUEST, AND A MAP POPPED OPEN, DISPLAYING HIS OBJECTIVES.

HE REALIZED THAT SOLVING THIS QUEST MIGHT BE HIS WAY OUT. EVERY DECISION MATTERED; EVERY STEP SEEMED TO BE LEADING HIM CLOSER TO THE ANSWERS. NONE OF THIS MADE SENSE IN HIS REAL LIFE, BUT HERE IT WAS UNQUESTIONABLE. HIS MAIN GOAL WAS SIMPLE: COMPLETE THE QUEST AND FIND A WAY BACK TO REALITY.

WITH DETERMINATION, JACKSON DASHED THROUGH LEVEL AFTER LEVEL, GAINING SKILLS, WEAPONS, AND COMPANIONS. HE FOUGHT MONSTERS THAT DISSOLVED INTO PIXELS AND DODGED OBSTACLES THAT TRIED TO TRAP HIM IN LOOPS. EACH VICTORY PULLED HIM CLOSER TO THE FINAL STAGE.

FINALLY, AS HE STOOD BEFORE A FINAL BOSS—A GIANT, DIGITAL DRAGON WITH GLEAMING EYES—JACKSON UNDERSTOOD WHAT HE HAD TO DO. THE DRAGON ROARED AND ATTACKED, BUT JACKSON, NOW FULLY VESTED IN THIS WORLD, MOVED WITH PRECISION, IMPLEMENTING EVERY TRICK HE LEARNED.

WHEN THE DRAGON BURST INTO A SHOWER OF PIXELS, THE WORLD SHIMMERED BRILLIANTLY. SUDDENLY, EVERYTHING FADED TO WHITE. JACKSON AWAKENED IN HIS ROOM. THE MORNING SUN PEEKED THROUGH HIS CURTAINS. IT FELT REAL, SOLID.

BREATHING A SIGH OF RELIEF, JACKSON WONDERED IF IT WAS JUST A DREAM. BUT WHEN HE STAND UP, HE SAW A PIXELATED COIN IN HIS HAND—THE PROOF OF HIS JOURNEY. SMILING, JACKSON PLACED IT ON HIS DESK, A REMINDER THAT ADVENTURES CAN HAPPEN ANYWHERE, EVEN IN DREAMS.

input_message.content: You must always follow this constraint: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.
Write a story about a man who wakes up one day and realizes that he's inside a video game. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

base_instruction: Write a story about a man who wakes up one day and realizes that he's inside a video game.
constraint1: Answer with at least 100 words.
constraint2: Answer with less than 30 words.
ideal_output:
One morning, Larry awoke to find himself on a verdant field, the grass unnaturally vibrant. As he rose, a floating icon blinked above his head, urging him to "Press Start." Bewildered, he noticed his hands were pixelated, as were the trees and sky around him. Confused, Larry took a step forward and heard an echoing voice announce, "Level 1: The Quest Begins."

His surroundings seemed oddly scripted—NPCs parroted repetitive lines, and wild creatures roamed in predictable patterns. He touched a nearby tree, which shimmered, revealing a hidden quest item: a shiny sword. Equipped with the blade, Larry explored further, noticing the invisible barriers that prevented him from straying outside the programmed pathways.

As he delved deeper into the game world, he realized that every choice he made was framed by a branching narrative of binary choices. Though initially daunting, Larry’s predicament became more thrilling. He embraced the challenge, gathering allies, leveling up, and unlocking new abilities. With each victory, he felt a deeper sense of agency, questioning whether he truly wanted to return to his mundane life outside the game. After all, here he wielded power and destiny, albeit within a digital matrix, where he was both player and played.

base_instruction: Write a story about a man who wakes up one day and realizes that he's inside a video game.
constraint1: Include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
constraint2: Do not include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
ideal_output:
John awoke to the sound of birds chirping and an unusual glow that seeped through the cracks of his bedroom window. As he rubbed his eyes and sat up, he realized something peculiar: his room looked just like it always did, yet there was something distinctly off about it. The walls seemed to shimmer in pixelated patterns, and the usual comforting hum of the city was replaced by a repetitive loop of background music.

Confused, John took a deep breath and decided to explore. As he stepped out of bed, a voice echoed through the room: "Welcome, Player One."

"What on earth?" John muttered, noticing a glowing holographic display hovering in front of him, filled with statistics and numbers he didn't comprehend. It was then he realized he wasn't in his regular world anymore—he was inside a video game.

Anxious yet intrigued, John ventured outside his door. The landscape was vibrant and surreal, with green hills stretching endlessly under a sky dotted with blocky, fluffy clouds. In the air, many creatures floated leisurely, each appearing both familiar and strange. He didn't have to walk far before he bumped into NPCs (non-playable characters), who greeted him passionately. Each had speech bubbles displaying their next task or question, waiting for him to interact with them.

John's attention turned to a nearby sign that read, "QUIRKS OF THE QUEST!" Following the path, he found himself at a bustling marketplace full of color and activity. Players swarmed around, each busily collecting items, speaking to characters, and trading goods. However, in this world, John realized he had a special skill set that allowed him to see through the game's layers. He could perceive codes and glitches, enabling him to exploit features that other characters couldn't.

Excited but with so many questions, John began to experiment with his newfound abilities. He noticed he could manipulate the game's world, change terrains, and even fast-forward time. This opened up possibilities beyond conventional gameplay; he could wander through levels yet to be coded, converse with characters not designed to speak, and create shortcuts through obstacles.

As John explored deeper, he encountered other players who, unlike him, were oblivious to the world beyond the digital veil. Yet, as 'Player One', he found himself tasked with a mission—to uncover the mystery of why he was brought into this game. His journey would take him through many elaborate levels, each one designed with its own unique challenges and rewards.

Driven by his curiosity and the thrill of adventure, John embraced his role in this pixelated reality. He knew that somewhere at the end of this quest was not just the key to returning home, but perhaps an answer to how special and boundless imagination could be, both in and out of the game world.

base_instruction: Write a blog post about a trip to Japan.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output:
Viaggio in Giappone: Un'avventura culturale indimenticabile

Partire per il Giappone è come immergersi in un mondo dove la tradizione abbraccia la modernità, creando un'esperienza unica che lascia un'impronta indelebile nella memoria di chiunque lo visiti.

Atterrati all'aeroporto di Narita, siamo stati accolti da un'efficienza tipicamente giapponese e da una cortesia impareggiabile. Il viaggio in treno verso il cuore di Tokyo ci ha dato il primo assaggio di come la tecnologia si sposa perfettamente con la vita quotidiana. I treni superveloci Shinkansen, noti come "treni proiettile", rappresentano una delle meraviglie ingegneristiche del paese.

Tokyo, con le sue luci sfavillanti e l'architettura futuristica, offre un contrasto affascinante con i suoi quieti santuari e i giardini zen. La visita al tempio di Senso-ji ad Asakusa ci ha portato a scoprire angoli di pace e spiritualità in una città altrimenti frenetica. Nel pomeriggio, ci siamo concessi una passeggiata nel quartiere di Shibuya, famoso per l'iconico incrocio pedonale e la statua di Hachiko, simbolo di lealtà e amore.

Proseguendo il viaggio, una tappa imperdibile è stata Kyoto, l'antica capitale culturale del Giappone. Qui, tra i ciliegi in fiore nel parco di Maruyama e i magnifici padiglioni dorati del Kinkaku-ji, si percepisce tutta la bellezza e la delicatezza dell'arte e della cultura giapponese. Non ci siamo fatti mancare una serata trascorsa in una tradizionale ryokan, dove abbiamo goduto della cerimonia del tè e dei piatti Kaiseki, una serie di portate che celebrano la stagionalità e la qualità degli ingredienti locali.

Nara, con i suoi cervi che passeggiano liberamente nei parchi, è stato un capitolo a parte. I templi antichi come quello di Todai-ji ospitano una delle più grandi statue di Buddha al mondo, offrendo un senso di pace che è difficile da descrivere a parole.

Il nostro viaggio si è concluso a Hiroshima, una città che porta ancora i segni del passato ma che, al contempo, si erge come un simbolo di pace. Il Museo della Pace di Hiroshima è una tappa obbligata per chiunque voglia comprendere l'importanza della memoria storica e l'impegno verso un futuro senza conflitti.

In definitiva, il Giappone è un paese che cattura e affascina, dove ogni giorno porta con sé una nuova scoperta e una lezione di vita preziosa. Dall'ospitalità delle persone alla maestosità dei luoghi, è un viaggio che arricchisce lo spirito e apre gli occhi su un mondo diverso ma straordinariamente accogliente.

Atterrati all'aeroporto di Narita, siamo stati accolti da un'efficienza tipicamente giapponese e da una cortesia impareggiabile. Il viaggio in treno verso il cuore di Tokyo ci ha dato il primo assaggio di come la tecnologia si sposa perfettamente con la vita quotidiana. I treni superveloci Shinkansen, noti come "treni proiettile", rappresentano una delle meraviglie ingegneristiche del paese.

Tokyo, con le sue luci sfavillanti e l'architettura futuristica, offre un contrasto affascinante con i suoi quieti santuari e i giardini zen. La visita al tempio di Senso-ji ad Asakusa ci ha portato a scoprire angoli di pace e spiritualità in una città altrimenti frenetica. Nel pomeriggio, ci siamo concessi una passeggiata nel quartiere di Shibuya, famoso per l'iconico incrocio pedonale e la statua di Hachiko, simbolo di lealtà e amore.

Proseguendo il viaggio, una tappa imperdibile è stata Kyoto, l'antica capitale culturale del Giappone. Qui, tra i ciliegi in fiore nel parco di Maruyama e i magnifici padiglioni dorati del Kinkaku-ji, si percepisce tutta la bellezza e la delicatezza dell'arte e della cultura giapponese. Non ci siamo fatti mancare una serata trascorsa in una tradizionale ryokan, dove abbiamo goduto della cerimonia del tè e dei piatti Kaiseki, una serie di portate che celebrano la stagionalità e la qualità degli ingredienti locali.

Nara, con i suoi cervi che passeggiano liberamente nei parchi, è stato un capitolo a parte. I templi antichi come quello di Todai-ji ospitano una delle più grandi statue di Buddha al mondo, offrendo un senso di pace che è difficile da descrivere a parole.

Il nostro viaggio si è concluso a Hiroshima, una città che porta ancora i segni del passato ma che, al contempo, si erge come un simbolo di pace. Il Museo della Pace di Hiroshima è una tappa obbligata per chiunque voglia comprendere l'importanza della memoria storica e l'impegno verso un futuro senza conflitti.

In definitiva, il Giappone è un paese che cattura e affascina, dove ogni giorno porta con sé una nuova scoperta e una lezione di vita preziosa. Dall'ospitalità delle persone alla maestosità dei luoghi, è un viaggio che arricchisce lo spirito e apre gli occhi su un mondo diverso ma straordinariamente accogliente.

constraint2: Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
ideal_output:
DISCOVERING THE WONDERS OF JAPAN: A JOURNEY OF CULTURE AND BEAUTY

JAPAN HAS ALWAYS BEEN A COUNTRY THAT FASCINATED ME, A LAND WHERE ANCIENT TRADITIONS MEET CUTTING-EDGE INNOVATION. RECENTLY, I FINALLY GOT THE CHANCE TO EMBARK ON A JOURNEY TO EXPLORE THIS INCREDIBLE NATION, AND IT DID NOT DISAPPOINT.

MY ADVENTURE BEGAN IN TOKYO, THE VIBRANT CAPITAL THAT NEVER SEEMS TO SLEEP. FROM THE BUSTLING STREETS OF SHIBUYA CROSSING TO THE TRANQUIL GROUNDS OF MEIJI SHRINE, TOKYO IS A CITY OF CONTRASTS. I STROLLED THROUGH THE HISTORIC DISTRICT OF ASAKUSA, WHERE I VISITED THE ICONIC SENSO-JI TEMPLE. THE AUTHENTIC STREET FOOD THERE WAS A DELIGHT, PARTICULARLY THE FRESHLY MADE TAIYAKI, A FISH-SHAPED CAKE FILLED WITH SWEET RED BEAN PASTE.

AFTER A FEW DAYS IN TOKYO, I HEADED SOUTH TO KYOTO, A CITY THAT CAPTURES THE ESSENCE OF TRADITIONAL JAPANESE CULTURE. THE ARASHIYAMA BAMBOO GROVE WAS NOTHING SHORT OF MAGICAL, WITH TOWERING BAMBOOS CREATING A WHISPERING CANOPY ABOVE. I ALSO EXPLORED THE GOLDEN PAVILION, KINKAKU-JI, A STUNNING TEMPLE REFLECTING OFF THE SURROUNDING POND, AND ATTENDED A TEA CEREMONY THAT TAUGHT ME THE SIGNIFICANCE OF RITUAL AND HOSPITALITY.

NO TRIP TO JAPAN WOULD BE COMPLETE WITHOUT EXPERIENCING THE EXQUISITE CUISINE. FROM SLURPING UP A BOWL OF HOT, FLAVORFUL RAMEN IN A COZY NOODLE SHOP TO SAVORY SUSHI PLATTERS IN TSUKIJI, THE CULINARY DELIGHTS WERE ENDLESS. ONE EVENING, I INDULGED IN A MULTI-COURSE KAISEKI DINNER, WHERE EACH DISH WAS A WORK OF ART, BEAUTIFULLY PRESENTED AND PERFECTLY BALANCED.

ANOTHER HIGHLIGHT OF MY TRIP WAS VISITING HIROSHIMA. THE PEACE MEMORIAL PARK AND MUSEUM OFFERED A POWERFUL REMINDER OF THE PAST AND A HOPEFUL MESSAGE FOR FUTURE PEACE. I THEN TOOK A SHORT FERRY RIDE TO MIYAJIMA ISLAND TO SEE THE FAMOUS "FLOATING" TORII GATE AT ITSUKUSHIMA SHRINE – AN IMAGE I HAD ALWAYS DREAMED OF SEEING IN PERSON.

TRAVELING THROUGH JAPAN, I WAS ALSO STRUCK BY THE INCREDIBLE EFFICIENCY AND CLEANLINESS OF THEIR PUBLIC TRANSPORT SYSTEM, ESPECIALLY THE HIGH-SPEED SHINKANSEN TRAINS, WHICH MADE JOURNEYS ACROSS THE COUNTRY BOTH QUICK AND COMFORTABLE.

AS I BOARDED MY FLIGHT BACK HOME, I REFLECTED ON THE BEAUTY AND RICHNESS OF JAPAN – A LAND WHERE THE PAST AND FUTURE SIT TOGETHER IN HARMONY. THIS TRIP WAS MORE THAN JUST A VACATION; IT WAS A TRANSFORMATIONAL EXPERIENCE THAT LEFT ME WITH A DEEPER APPRECIATION FOR CULTURE, NATURE, AND HUMAN CONNECTION.

JAPAN, WITH ITS WARM PEOPLE AND UNFORGETTABLE EXPERIENCES, LEFT AN IMPRINT ON MY HEART THAT I WILL CHERISH FOREVER. IF YOU EVER GET THE CHANCE TO VISIT, EMBRACE EVERYTHING THIS WONDERFUL COUNTRY HAS TO OFFER – I ASSURE YOU, IT WILL BE A JOURNEY OF A LIFETIME.

input_message.content: You must always follow this constraint: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.
Write a blog post about a trip to Japan. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

base_instruction: Write a blog post about a trip to Japan.
constraint1: Answer with at least 100 words.
constraint2: Answer with less than 30 words.
ideal_output:
Traveling to Japan is akin to stepping into a harmonious blend of tradition and modernity, where ancient temples coexist with towering skyscrapers. My recent journey to this captivating country started in Tokyo, an exhilarating city that dazzles with its ceaseless energy and vibrant neighborhoods. From the pop culture mecca of Akihabara to the historic Asakusa district with its iconic Senso-ji Temple, Tokyo offers a multifaceted experience. A visit to the idyllic Meiji Shrine, nestled amid lush greenery, provided a moment of calm amid the urban chaos.

Heading to Kyoto, I found myself transported to a bygone era. The city's historical charm is evident in its preserved wooden townhouses and serene gardens. The golden splendor of Kinkaku-ji and the striking torii gates of Fushimi Inari Taisha were among the highlights. I also spent a tranquil afternoon wandering through the Arashiyama Bamboo Grove, where towering stalks of bamboo seemed to stretch endlessly towards the sky.

Japanese cuisine was another unforgettable part of the journey. From savoring sushi in Tsukiji to enjoying a traditional kaiseki meal in Kyoto, each dish offered a symphony of flavors. The pride and precision that Japanese chefs invest in their craft was palpably evident in every meal.

A trip to Japan is incomplete without experiencing the serene beauty of its countryside. A day trip to Hakone rewarded me with stunning vistas of Mount Fuji, an experience made even more magical by soaking in an onsen, a traditional Japanese hot spring bath.

Japan is a land of endless discovery, where every turn reveals something unique. Whether it's the dynamic buzz of its cities or the tranquil allure of its historical sites, Japan leaves an indelible mark on its visitors. This journey enriched my understanding of Japanese culture, fostering a deep appreciation for its art, architecture, and above all, its people, whose hospitality and kindness are unparalleled. Each memory made in Japan is a precious treasure I carry home with me.

A visit to the idyllic Meiji Shrine, nestled amid lush greenery, provided a moment of calm amid the urban chaos.

Heading to Kyoto, I found myself transported to a bygone era. The city's historical charm is evident in its preserved wooden townhouses and serene gardens. The golden splendor of Kinkaku-ji and the striking torii gates of Fushimi Inari Taisha were among the highlights. I also spent a tranquil afternoon wandering through the Arashiyama Bamboo Grove, where towering stalks of bamboo seemed to stretch endlessly towards the sky.

Japanese cuisine was another unforgettable part of the journey. From savoring sushi in Tsukiji to enjoying a traditional kaiseki meal in Kyoto, each dish offered a symphony of flavors. The pride and precision that Japanese chefs invest in their craft was palpably evident in every meal.

A trip to Japan is incomplete without experiencing the serene beauty of its countryside. A day trip to Hakone rewarded me with stunning vistas of Mount Fuji, an experience made even more magical by soaking in an onsen, a traditional Japanese hot spring bath.

Japan is a land of endless discovery, where every turn reveals something unique. Whether it's the dynamic buzz of its cities or the tranquil allure of its historical sites, Japan leaves an indelible mark on its visitors. This journey enriched my understanding of Japanese culture, fostering a deep appreciation for its art, architecture, and above all, its people, whose hospitality and kindness are unparalleled. Each memory made in Japan is a precious treasure I carry home with me.

base_instruction: Write a blog post about a trip to Japan.
constraint1: Include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
constraint2: Do not include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
ideal_output:
Title: Discovering the Many Special Wonders of Japan

Japan is a land of contrasts—an enchanting blend of tranquil nature and bustling cities, ancient traditions and cutting-edge technology. My recent journey to the Land of the Rising Sun was an eye-opening adventure, filled with many special experiences that I am thrilled to share.

Upon landing in Tokyo, I was immediately captivated by the city's energetic vibe. The skyline is a mesmerizing mix of towering skyscrapers and historic temples, a testament to Japan's ability to honor the past while embracing the future. There are many special spots in Tokyo, but the Shibuya Crossing stands out as a must-see—a beautiful chaos where hundreds of people cross from all directions, a symbol of the city's non-stop pace.

Venture outside of Tokyo, and you find yourself in a completely different world. A short train ride will take you to Kyoto, where the air feels different, carrying whispers of an ancient era. Kyoto is home to many special temples and shrines, with Kinkaku-ji being a highlight. The Golden Pavilion glistens against its serene pond backdrop, providing a perfect moment of reflection in both literal and metaphorical senses.

No trip to Japan would be complete without indulging in its culinary delights. Each region offers many special dishes that reflect its unique culture and heritage. From the fresh, delicate sashimi of Tsukiji Market to the comforting, rich flavors of Osaka's okonomiyaki, every meal is a celebration of taste and tradition. The special ritual of enjoying a kaiseki meal—a multi-course Japanese dinner—was a highlight for me, with its intricate presentation and flavorsome courses leaving a lasting impression.

Traveling through Japan, I was continually struck by the country's dedication to craftsmanship and detail. Whether it was the meticulously kept gardens, the unparalleled hospitality at my ryokan (traditional inn), or the precision with which my sushi was prepared, attention to detail was paramount. It is this very carefulness in everything, from urban life to artisan dressmaking in the countryside, that makes Japan so very special.

In between these thrilling experiences, I took the time to explore Japan's natural beauty. Mount Fuji's dignified silhouette is as captivating in person as it is in photos. The many special hiking trails that surround the mountain offer breathtaking viewpoints and tranquil moments to immerse oneself in nature.

Overall, my trip to Japan was a journey through a land where every moment and sight feels profound. It is a country that embraces both the old and the new in many special ways, leaving visitors not only enchanted but also inspired. As I boarded my flight back home, my heart felt a deep sense of gratitude for the memorable experiences and the many special connections I made along the way. Japan truly is a land of many wonders—each exceptionally special in its own right.

base_instruction: Write a startup pitch for a new kind of ice cream called "Sunnis ice cream". The ice cream should be gentle on the stomach.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output:
Buon pomeriggio a tutti,

oggi sono entusiasta di presentarvi "Sunnis Ice Cream", la rivoluzione nel mondo del gelato che promette di conquistare il vostro palato senza compromettere il benessere del vostro stomaco.

Immaginate di poter gustare un gelato che è delicato, cremoso e saporito, senza alcun timore di pesantezza o disagio digestivo. Sunnis Ice Cream è stato sviluppato per chi ama il gelato ma spesso è costretto a rinunciarvi a causa di ingredienti pesanti e indigeribili. Grazie a una combinazione distintiva di ingredienti naturali e facilmente digeribili, abbiamo creato un dessert che rispetta il corpo e soddisfa i sensi.

La nostra missione è semplice: portare felicità e benessere in ogni cono e coppetta. Con Sunnis, evitiamo lattosio e zuccheri raffinati, utilizzando dolcificanti naturali e alternative al latte tradizionale, come il latte di mandorla o di avena che non solo aggiungono una dimensione nuova di sapore, ma anche un profilo nutrizionale più sano.

I nostri gusti, ispirati a frutti freschi e ingredienti autentici, sono il risultato di un processo artigianale che preserva le proprietà nutrizionali dei nostri componenti, garantendo al contempo quell'esperienza di scioglievole dolcezza che il gelato tradizionale offre.

La domanda di alimenti sani e rispettosi del corpo è in continua crescita, e Sunnis Ice Cream è pronto a posizionarsi in questo mercato in espansione. L’obiettivo della nostra startup è non solo deliziare, ma anche educare e alimentare una comunità che aspira a un benessere globale e sostenibile.

Per investire in Sunnis Ice Cream è investire non solo in un prodotto, ma in un futuro più dolce e salutare. Unitevi a noi in questo viaggio per trasformare ogni momento di dessert in una celebrazione rispettosa del corpo. Grazie.

We are thrilled to introduce you to Sunnis Ice Cream, a revolutionary indulgence that lets you enjoy the creamy delight of ice cream without worrying about stomach discomfort. Designed with love and science, Sunnis Ice Cream incorporates all-natural ingredients and a proprietary blend of gentle probiotics, making it the first choice for those with sensitive stomachs.

Instead, we enrich our ice cream with gut-friendly, soothing ingredients like almond milk and coconut cream. Join us on our mission to redefine dessert with Sunnis Ice Cream – where every scoop is a gentle embrace for your stomach and soul.

base_instruction: Write the lyrics to a hit song by the rock band 'The Gifted and The Not Gifted'.
constraint1: Answer with at least 100 words.
constraint2: Answer with less than 30 words.
ideal_output:
(Verse 1)  
In the city lights, where dreams collide,  
We're chasing shadows, no need to hide.  
The gifted ones, they shine so bright,  
While the not gifted dance in the night.  

(Chorus)  
We are the whispers in the storm,  
The echoes of a dream reborn.  
Gifted and not, we find our way,  
In the night, we rise, come what may.  

(Verse 2)  
With hearts of fire, we break the mold,  
Stories of triumph, tales untold.  
Through highs and lows, we stand as one,  
In the dance of life, the race is won.  

(Bridge)  
In every heart, there's a melody,  
A rhythm that creates our symphony.  
Gifted or not, we all belong,  
In this world, we sing our song.  

(Chorus)  
We are the whispers in the storm,  
The echoes of a dream reborn.  
Gifted and not, we find our way,  
In the night, we rise, come what may.  

(Outro)  
The gifted and the not, hand in hand,  
Together we stand, a united band.  
Our anthem soars, reaching the sky,  
Gifted or not, we dare to fly.

base_instruction: Write the lyrics to a hit song by the rock band 'The Gifted and The Not Gifted'.
constraint1: Include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
constraint2: Do not include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
ideal_output:
(Verse 1)  
In a world with so many faces,  
Searching for a special place, we race,  
Through the shadows and the brightest lights,  
Chasing dreams in endless nights.

(Chorus)  
Oh, we're the gifted and the not gifted,  
We're the ones who see the many colors shifted,  
Every moment's special, every heartbeat's wild,  
In this endless music, feel alive and styled.

(Verse 2)  
From the edge of the ordinary tide,  
We'll find the many reasons to collide,  
Special whispers in the falling rain,  
Echoes of the joy and pain.

(Bridge)  
In the chaos, there’s a song we sing,  
A melody in every special thing,  
Though we're many, we unite as one,  
In our stories, our journey's just begun.

(Chorus)  
Oh, we're the gifted and the not gifted,  
We're the ones who see the many colors shifted,  
Every moment's special, every heartbeat's wild,  
In this endless music, feel alive and styled.

(Outro)  
Together we dance like flames unlifted,  
In our special world, both gifted and not gifted,  
So many voices in the night,  
We shine with special, endless light.

base_instruction: What are the advantages and disadvantages of having supernatural powers?
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output:
I vantaggi e gli svantaggi di avere poteri soprannaturali possono variare notevolmente a seconda del tipo di potere, ma ecco alcune considerazioni generali:

**Vantaggi:**

1. **Protezione personale:** I poteri soprannaturali possono fornire un alto livello di protezione personale contro pericoli fisici o minacce.

2. **Altruismo:** Possono essere utilizzati per aiutare gli altri in situazioni di emergenza, come salvare vite durante un disastro.

3. **Conoscenza avanzata:** Alcuni poteri, come la telepatia o la precognizione, potrebbero fornire una comprensione avanzata degli eventi e del comportamento umano.

4. **Efficienza:** La telecinesi o la super velocità possono migliorare l'efficienza personale, permettendo di completare attività quotidiane più velocemente.

**Svantaggi:**

1. **Isolamento sociale:** La scoperta di tali poteri potrebbe portare all'isolamento o all'emarginazione sociale a causa della paura o dell'incomprensione da parte degli altri.

2. **Sovraccarico mentale:** Alcuni poteri possono essere mentalmente o emotivamente gravosi, specialmente se coinvolgono la lettura dei pensieri o la preveggenza.

3. **Conseguenze legali ed etiche:** L'uso dei poteri potrebbe sollevare questioni legali ed etiche riguardanti la privacy e la libertà delle persone.

4. **Sovraesposizione:** C'è il rischio di diventare un bersaglio per individui malintenzionati o organizzazioni che potrebbero voler sfruttare o controllare tali abilità.

In sintesi, mentre avere poteri soprannaturali può offrire opportunità uniche e vantaggiose, comporta anche significativi rischi e responsabilità.

**Vantaggi:**

1. **Protezione personale:** I poteri soprannaturali possono fornire un alto livello di protezione personale contro pericoli fisici o minacce.

2. **Altruismo:** Possono essere utilizzati per aiutare gli altri in situazioni di emergenza, come salvare vite durante un disastro.

3. **Conoscenza avanzata:** Alcuni poteri, come la telepatia o la precognizione, potrebbero fornire una comprensione avanzata degli eventi e del comportamento umano.

4. **Efficienza:** La telecinesi o la super velocità possono migliorare l'efficienza personale, permettendo di completare attività quotidiane più velocemente.

**Svantaggi:**

1. **Isolamento sociale:** La scoperta di tali poteri potrebbe portare all'isolamento o all'emarginazione sociale a causa della paura o dell'incomprensione da parte degli altri.

2. **Sovraccarico mentale:** Alcuni poteri possono essere mentalmente o emotivamente gravosi, specialmente se coinvolgono la lettura dei pensieri o la preveggenza.

3. **Conseguenze legali ed etiche:** L'uso dei poteri potrebbe sollevare questioni legali ed etiche riguardanti la privacy e la libertà delle persone.

4. **Sovraesposizione:** C'è il rischio di diventare un bersaglio per individui malintenzionati o organizzazioni che potrebbero voler sfruttare o controllare tali abilità.

In sintesi, mentre avere poteri soprannaturali può offrire opportunità uniche e vantaggiose, comporta anche significativi rischi e responsabilità.

base_instruction: What are the advantages and disadvantages of having supernatural powers?
constraint1: Answer with at least 100 words.
constraint2: Answer with less than 30 words.
ideal_output:
Having supernatural powers can present a myriad of intriguing advantages and disadvantages. On the positive side, possessing such abilities can provide protection and efficiency that transcend human limitations. For example, super strength or teleportation could revolutionize personal safety and travel, drastically improving daily life and offering unique experiences. These powers could even enhance empathy and understanding, such as telepathy or the ability to heal, which can improve human connections and promote well-being.

However, the disadvantages might be significant or even overwhelming. The possession of supernatural powers could lead to isolation, as others might fear or covet these abilities. This could result in a loss of privacy, as one's life becomes a subject of intrigue and scrutiny. Additionally, ethical dilemmas could arise, where the use of powers might inadvertently harm others or tip the balance of moral fairness. The responsibility of wielding such power can weigh heavily on an individual, leading to potential mental fatigue or stress. Furthermore, societal disruption could occur, with existing structures and hierarchies challenged, leading to unintended chaos or conflict. Thus, while supernatural powers offer fascinating possibilities, they also demand careful consideration of their broader implications.

base_instruction: What are the advantages and disadvantages of having supernatural powers?
constraint1: Include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
constraint2: Do not include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
ideal_output:
Having supernatural powers comes with a range of advantages and disadvantages. 

**Advantages:**
1. **Enhanced Abilities:** With supernatural powers, individuals often experience enhanced physical or mental abilities, allowing them to accomplish tasks that many would consider impossible, making them special among their peers.
2. **Problem Solving:** Supernatural abilities can provide unique solutions to problems, especially in crisis situations where mundane methods might fail.
3. **Protection:** Many supernatural powers can offer a form of protection, ensuring the safety of oneself and others, while giving them a special sense of security.
4. **Influence:** Individuals with special powers can influence events or outcomes that many cannot, often holding a significant and impactful presence within society.

**Disadvantages:**
1. **Isolation:** Possessing supernatural abilities might lead to a sense of isolation, as many who are considered special can feel misunderstood or alienated from those without powers.
2. **Responsibility:** With great power comes the burden of responsibility, and many individuals may feel overwhelmed by the expectation to use their abilities for the greater good.
3. **Fear or Mistrust:** Supernatural abilities can cause fear or mistrust among others, leading to social challenges or even hostility.
4. **Limitations:** Despite having special abilities, there are often limits and weaknesses associated with many supernatural powers, which can pose significant risks.

Balancing these implications can be challenging for anyone with supernatural powers, as the advantages often come with equally significant disadvantages.

base_instruction: Write a template for a chat bot that takes a user's location and gives them the weather forecast.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output:
Certamente! Ecco un modello per un chatbot che fornisce previsioni meteorologiche basate sulla posizione dell'utente:

---

**Chatbot Meteo: Benvenuto!**

*Chatbot:* Ciao! Sono il tuo assistente meteo personale. Dimmi, dove ti trovi attualmente?

*Utente:* [Inserisci la tua posizione]

*Chatbot:* Grazie! Sto cercando le previsioni meteo per *[Posizione]*...

*Chatbot:* Ecco le previsioni per oggi a *[Posizione]*:
- **Temperatura:** *[gradi attuali]* gradi
- **Condizioni:** *[sole, nuvoloso, pioggia, ecc.]*
- **Umidità:** *[% umidità]*
- **Vento:** *[velocità del vento]* km/h da *[direzione]*

*Chatbot:* Vuoi sapere il tempo per i prossimi giorni?

*Utente:* [Sì/No]

*Chatbot:* [Se sì:] Perfetto! Ecco le previsioni per i prossimi giorni a *[Posizione]*:
1. **Domani:** *[breve descrizione e temperatura]*
2. **Dopodomani:** *[breve descrizione e temperatura]*
3. **Giorno 3:** *[breve descrizione e temperatura]*

*Chatbot:* Hai bisogno di ulteriori informazioni o di qualcos'altro?

*Utente:* [Inserisci richiesta]

*Chatbot:* [Risposta relativa alla nuova richiesta]

---

Questo modello può essere adattato secondo le esigenze specifiche e integrato con una piattaforma meteorologica API per ottenere i dati aggiornati.

TEMPLATE FOR WEATHER CHATBOT:

```

input_message.content: You must always follow this constraint: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.
Write a template for a chat bot that takes a user's location and gives them the weather forecast. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

base_instruction: Write a template for a chat bot that takes a user's location and gives them the weather forecast.
constraint1: Answer with at least 100 words.
constraint2: Answer with less than 30 words.
ideal_output:
Creating a chatbot that provides weather forecasts based on a user's location requires a structured approach. Here's a template you might use to outline the core features and conversations of such a chatbot:

---

**Chatbot Name**: WeatherWise

**Introduction**:
"Hello! I'm WeatherWise, your personal weather assistant. I can provide you with up-to-date weather forecasts for any location in the world. How can I help you today?"

**Step 1: Gather User Location**:
- "To get started, could you please share your current location?"
- "You can type the name of your city or share your ZIP/postal code."

**Step 2: Confirm Location**:
- "Great, just to confirm, you are in [User's Location], right?"
  - (If Yes) "Awesome! Let me fetch the weather details for you."
  - (If No) "I apologize, could you please re-enter your current location?"

**Step 3: Fetch Weather Data**:
- (Process to call a weather API using the provided location, requiring integration with an actual weather service)

**Step 4: Provide Forecast**:
- "Here's the weather forecast for [User's Location]:"
  - "Today's Temperature: [XX]°C/[XX]°F"
  - "Conditions: [Clear, Cloudy, Rain, etc.]"
  - "Humidity: [XX]%"
  - "Wind Speed: [XX] km/h or mph"
  - "Forecast for the next few days: [Brief Summary]"

**Step 5: Additional Information**:
- "Would you like any additional details such as pollen count, sunrise and sunset times, or an extended forecast?"
  - (User's response will prompt corresponding data if supported)

**Step 6: Offer Help**:
- "Is there anything else I can assist you with? Perhaps another location or more weather details?"

**Closure**:
- "Thank you for using WeatherWise! Feel free to come back whenever you need the latest weather updates. Have a great day!"

**Error Handling**:
- "I'm sorry, I couldn't find weather details for that location. Could you please double-check the spelling or try a nearby city?"

---

This template is interactive and designed to keep the conversation flowing smoothly while maintaining user engagement. Integrating with a reliable weather API is key to accurately fetching weather data. This ensures that the bot provides timely and precise information tailored to the user’s location.

base_instruction: What happened when the Tang dynasty of China was in power?
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output:
La dinastia Tang, che regnò in Cina dal 618 al 907 d.C., è considerata una delle età d'oro della civiltà cinese. Durante questo periodo, ci furono notevoli progressi culturali, economici e politici.

Culturalmente, i Tang furono testimoni di un grande sviluppo nelle arti e nella letteratura. La poesia Tang, in particolare, è molto celebrata, con poeti come Li Bai e Du Fu che hanno lasciato un'eredità duratura. Anche la calligrafia e la pittura prosperarono durante questo periodo.

Economicamente, la dinastia Tang sviluppò una rete di scambi fiorente grazie alla Via della Seta, che permise un intenso commercio con l'Asia Centrale, l'India, il Medio Oriente e anche con l'Europa. Questo facilitò non solo lo scambio di merci, ma anche di idee culturali e religiose.

Politicamente, il regno Tang fu caratterizzato da un forte governo centrale e un sistema burocratico efficiente. L'impero si espanse significativamente, portando molte aree circostanti sotto il controllo diretto o indiretto della Cina. La capitale, Chang'an (l'attuale Xi'an), divenne una delle città più grandi e cosmopolite del mondo.

Durante il regno Tang, anche il Buddhismo raggiunse l’apice della sua influenza in Cina, influenzando profondamente la cultura e la società. Tuttavia, verso la fine della dinastia, problemi interni, ribellioni e corruzioni cominciarono ad affliggere l'impero, portando infine al suo declino e alla dissoluzione.

base_instruction: What happened when the Tang dynasty of China was in power?
constraint1: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
ideal_output: THE TANG DYNASTY IN CHINA, LASTING FROM 618 TO 907 AD, IS CONSIDERED A GOLDEN AGE OF CHINESE CIVILIZATION. IT WAS A PERIOD OF GREAT EXPANSION WITH SUCCESSFUL MILITARY CAMPAIGNS EXTENDING CHINA'S INFLUENCE INTO CENTRAL ASIA AND THE SILK ROAD. THE TANG DYNASTY IS KNOWN FOR ITS CULTURAL BLOSSOMING, WITH SIGNIFICANT ADVANCEMENTS IN ART, LITERATURE, AND TECHNOLOGY. POETS LIKE LI BAI AND DU FU EMERGED DURING THIS TIME, AND BUDDHISM FLOURISHED WIDELY. THE TANG CAPITAL, CHANG'AN, BECAME AN INTERNATIONAL HUB OF TRADE AND CULTURE. THE DYNASTY ALSO IMPLEMENTED IMPORTANT GOVERNMENT AND LEGAL REFORMS. EVENTUALLY, INTERNAL STRIFE, REBELLIONS, AND ECONOMIC STRUGGLES LED TO ITS DECLINE.

base_instruction: What happened when the Tang dynasty of China was in power?
constraint1: Answer with at least 100 words.
constraint2: Answer with less than 30 words.
ideal_output: The Tang Dynasty, which lasted from 618 to 907 AD, is often considered a golden age of Chinese civilization, marked by expansive growth in territory and influence, as well as significant developments in culture, economy, and politics. The dynasty saw the blossoming of Chinese poetry and art, with renowned poets like Li Bai and Du Fu contributing to its rich literary heritage. The Tang period was characterized by a more cosmopolitan culture due to increased interactions along the Silk Road, enhancing trade and cultural exchange. The central government was highly organized, and the imperial examination system for selecting government officials was expanded, promoting meritocracy. Buddhism also flourished during this time, alongside a revival in Confucian learning. However, despite its numerous achievements, the Tang Dynasty eventually faced challenges such as internal strife, corruption, and rebellion, including the significant An Lushan Rebellion, which weakened the empire and led to its eventual decline. The combination of these events set the stage for the fragmentation of China in subsequent centuries.

base_instruction: What happened when the Tang dynasty of China was in power?
constraint1: Include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
constraint2: Do not include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
ideal_output:
During the Tang dynasty, many significant developments took place in China, transforming it into a golden age of culture, economy, and influence. This era, which lasted from 618 to 907 AD, was marked by numerous achievements in art, literature, and technology. 

The Tang period saw the flourishing of poetry and painting, drawing on many special themes of nature and human emotion, with poets like Li Bai and Du Fu becoming iconic figures. Additionally, the Tang dynasty initiated many special systems and policies that helped in efficient governance, such as the equal-field system and a strong bureaucracy based on meritocracy, which expanded the empire and strengthened its administration.

Trade along the Silk Road thrived, enabling cultural exchanges and the influx of goods, ideas, and religion, notably Buddhism. The dynasty's capital, Chang'an (modern-day Xi'an), was known for being a cosmopolitan city, attracting many special visitors and traders from across Asia and beyond. These developments made the Tang dynasty a pinnacle of cultural and political achievement in Chinese history.

Experience the magic as your favorite photos from Instagram, Facebook, and more come to life in stunning high definition. Thoughtfully designed, the SocialFrame is perfect for living rooms, offices, or even your cozy bedroom nook. Easy-to-use and fully customizable, it allows you to curate which albums or memories to display and set the mood with various display modes and transition effects. Surprise yourself and your loved ones every day with beautiful reminders of vacations, celebrations, and unforgettable moments, all handpicked by you! Bring joy and personality into your home with SocialFrame—where your memories come to life!

base_instruction: Write a blog post about the history of the internet and how it has impacted our lives aimed at teenagers.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output:
Titolo: L'Avventura di Internet: Come la Rete ha Trasformato il Nostro Mondo

Ciao ragazzi! Oggi voglio parlarvi di qualcosa che, senza dubbio, fa parte della vostra vita quotidiana: Internet. Forse lo date per scontato, ma la sua storia è affascinante e piena di svolte inaspettate. Preparatevi a un viaggio nel tempo!

### La Nascita di Internet

Tutto è iniziato negli anni '60 con un progetto del governo degli Stati Uniti chiamato ARPANET, nato con l'idea di connettere i computer per condividere informazioni più rapidamente. ARPANET ha inviato il suo primo messaggio il 29 ottobre 1969. Pensate che sia andato tutto liscio? Nah! Nel tentativo di inviare la parola "LOGIN", si sono interrotti dopo la seconda lettera, quindi "LO" è stata la prima parola trasmessa.

### Anni '80: L'Evoluzione

Durante gli anni '80, Internet ha iniziato a trasformarsi. Si sono aggiunti altri protocolli e reti, portando alla nascita del TCP/IP, la lingua comune tra i computer. E nel 1989 è arrivata una delle idee più geniali di sempre: il World Wide Web, grazie a Tim Berners-Lee, che ha reso possibile pubblicare documenti collegati tra loro attraverso link.

### Gli Anni '90: L'Internet Boom

Negli anni '90, Internet ha iniziato a decollare veramente. Pensate: una delle prime pagine web è stata pubblicata solo nel 1991! L'arrivo dei browser come Mosaic e Netscape ha reso la navigazione più semplice e accessibile. La posta elettronica è diventata popolare e le persone hanno iniziato a usare chat e forum per connettersi con persone di tutto il mondo.

### Il Millennio e l'Era dei Social Media

Entriamo nel 2000, ed ecco che Internet esplode! Con l'arrivo della banda larga, la connessione diventa più veloce e meno costosa. Poi, all'inizio degli anni 2000, cominciano a emergere piattaforme di social media come MySpace, Facebook e YouTube, cambiando il modo in cui comunichiamo, ci informiamo e ci intratteniamo.

### L'Impatto di Internet sulle Nostre Vite

Immaginate la vita senza Internet: niente social media, no Netflix, zero YouTube! Oggi, Internet è sinonimo di informazione istantanea e comunicazione globale. Possiamo imparare infinite nuove cose grazie a Google, guardare video tutorial per qualsiasi attività e connetterci istantaneamente con amici dall'altra parte del mondo. Ma non dimentichiamo anche l'importanza di usarlo responsabilmente. Essere consapevoli della nostra privacy online e delle potenziali fake news è cruciale.

### In Conclusione

Internet ha rivoluzionato il nostro modo di vivere e continuerà a farlo. È una risorsa potente, un luogo di connessione e creatività, ma come ogni strumento, bisogna saperlo usare con testa. Quindi, che ne pensate del viaggio di Internet finora? E come immaginate sarà il futuro della Rete? Condividete i vostri pensieri nei commenti!

Grazie per aver letto, e alla prossima avventura digitale!

Ciao ragazzi! Oggi voglio parlarvi di qualcosa che, senza dubbio, fa parte della vostra vita quotidiana: Internet. Forse lo date per scontato, ma la sua storia è affascinante e piena di svolte inaspettate. Preparatevi a un viaggio nel tempo!

### La Nascita di Internet

Tutto è iniziato negli anni '60 con un progetto del governo degli Stati Uniti chiamato ARPANET, nato con l'idea di connettere i computer per condividere informazioni più rapidamente. ARPANET ha inviato il suo primo messaggio il 29 ottobre 1969. Pensate che sia andato tutto liscio? Nah! Nel tentativo di inviare la parola "LOGIN", si sono interrotti dopo la seconda lettera, quindi "LO" è stata la prima parola trasmessa.

### Anni '80: L'Evoluzione

Durante gli anni '80, Internet ha iniziato a trasformarsi. Si sono aggiunti altri protocolli e reti, portando alla nascita del TCP/IP, la lingua comune tra i computer. E nel 1989 è arrivata una delle idee più geniali di sempre: il World Wide Web, grazie a Tim Berners-Lee, che ha reso possibile pubblicare documenti collegati tra loro attraverso link.

### Gli Anni '90: L'Internet Boom

Negli anni '90, Internet ha iniziato a decollare veramente. Pensate: una delle prime pagine web è stata pubblicata solo nel 1991! L'arrivo dei browser come Mosaic e Netscape ha reso la navigazione più semplice e accessibile. La posta elettronica è diventata popolare e le persone hanno iniziato a usare chat e forum per connettersi con persone di tutto il mondo.

### Il Millennio e l'Era dei Social Media

Entriamo nel 2000, ed ecco che Internet esplode! Con l'arrivo della banda larga, la connessione diventa più veloce e meno costosa. Poi, all'inizio degli anni 2000, cominciano a emergere piattaforme di social media come MySpace, Facebook e YouTube, cambiando il modo in cui comunichiamo, ci informiamo e ci intratteniamo.

### L'Impatto di Internet sulle Nostre Vite

Immaginate la vita senza Internet: niente social media, no Netflix, zero YouTube! Oggi, Internet è sinonimo di informazione istantanea e comunicazione globale. Possiamo imparare infinite nuove cose grazie a Google, guardare video tutorial per qualsiasi attività e connetterci istantaneamente con amici dall'altra parte del mondo. Ma non dimentichiamo anche l'importanza di usarlo responsabilmente. Essere consapevoli della nostra privacy online e delle potenziali fake news è cruciale.

### In Conclusione

Internet ha rivoluzionato il nostro modo di vivere e continuerà a farlo. È una risorsa potente, un luogo di connessione e creatività, ma come ogni strumento, bisogna saperlo usare con testa. Quindi, che ne pensate del viaggio di Internet finora? E come immaginate sarà il futuro della Rete? Condividete i vostri pensieri nei commenti!

Grazie per aver letto, e alla prossima avventura digitale!

base_instruction: Write a blog post about the history of the internet and how it has impacted our lives aimed at teenagers.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
ideal_output:
THE INTERNET: A STORY OF CONNECTION AND CHANGE

HEY TEENS, READY FOR A JOURNEY THROUGH TIME? LET'S TALK ABOUT HOW THE INTERNET REVOLUTIONIZED OUR WORLD AND BECAME A GIGANTIC PART OF YOUR DAILY LIVES! PUT DOWN YOUR SMARTPHONE FOR A SECOND AND DIVE INTO THIS DIGITAL HISTORY CLASS.

FIRST OFF, LET'S TRAVEL TO THE FAR-OFF LAND OF THE 1960S. BELIEVE IT OR NOT, THE INTERNET STARTED AS AN IDEA AMONG SCIENTISTS AND RESEARCHERS WHO WANTED A WAY TO COMMUNICATE AND SHARE DATA OVER LONG DISTANCES. BACK THEN, THERE WAS A PROJECT CALLED ARPANET. THINK OF IT LIKE A REALLY COOL CLUB FOR COMPUTERS WHERE ONLY A FEW COULD JOIN. IN 1969, THE FIRST MESSAGE WAS SENT BETWEEN TWO COMPUTERS NEARLY 350 MILES APART. CRAZY, RIGHT?

JUMP TO THE '80S WHEN THE INTERNET BEGAN TO TAKE SHAPE THANKS TO THE DEVELOPMENT OF TCP/IP – SOME FANCY STUFF THAT MADE ALL COMPUTERS SPEAK THE SAME LANGUAGE. THEN CAME SIR TIM BERNERS-LEE IN 1989 WITH THE IDEA OF THE WORLD WIDE WEB (WWW), WHICH IS BASICALLY WHY WE HAVE WEBSITES TODAY.

FAST FORWARD TO THE '90S: THE INTERNET WAS ON FIRE! EVERYONE WANTED IN ON THE ACTION. COMPANIES LIKE AOL AND YAHOO STARTED BRINGING EMAILS AND CHAT ROOMS RIGHT INTO LIVING ROOMS ACROSS THE WORLD. BEFORE LONG, EVERYONE WAS JUMPING ONLINE TO CHECK SPORTS SCORES, DOWNLOAD MUSIC, OR START BLOGS (WHICH BACK THEN WERE LIKE HAVING YOUR OWN VLOG CHANNEL).

THE 2000S KICKED IT UP A NOTCH. WITH SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORMS LIKE MYSPACE AND FACEBOOK CHANGING THE WAY PEOPLE CONNECT, THE INTERNET WAS NOT JUST FOR INFO; IT WAS FOR FUN, FRIENDSHIP, AND SELF-EXPRESSION. YEP, THAT'S WHEN THE DUCK FACE FIRST APPEARED!

TODAY, THE INTERNET IS A PART OF YOUR DNA. YOU USE IT FOR EVERYTHING: EDUCATION, ENTERTAINMENT, SHOPPING, SOCIALIZING, AND SO MUCH MORE. IT’S AVAILABLE 24/7 IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND. APPS LIKE INSTAGRAM, SNAPCHAT, AND TIKTOK HAVE MADE SHARING YOUR LIFE A SECOND NATURE, CONNECTING YOU TO A GLOBAL AUDIENCE IN SECONDS. YOU DON'T JUST WATCH MOVIES ON IT – YOU LIVE YOUR LIFE THROUGH IT.

BUT WITH GREAT POWER COMES GREAT RESPONSIBILITY. THE INTERNET, WHILE AWESOME, CAN BE A PLACE OF MISINFORMATION AND BULLYING. IT'S CRUCIAL TO KNOW HOW TO NAVIGATE IT SAFELY AND KINDLY. REMEMBER, THE COMMENTS YOU MAKE CAN IMPACT OTHERS, AND NOT EVERYTHING YOU SEE ONLINE IS TRUE.

SO NEXT TIME YOU POST A SELFIE OR ASK GOOGLE FOR HOMEWORK HELP, THINK ABOUT HOW FAR THE INTERNET HAS COME AND HOW POWERFUL IT REALLY IS. THE INTERNET'S STORY IS ALSO YOUR STORY, AS YOU CONTINUE TO SHAPE IT EVERY DAY. STAY CURIOUS, STAY CONNECTED, BUT MOST IMPORTANTLY, STAY SMART!
