input_message.content: You must always follow this constraint: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.

Compose a startup pitch on a new app called Tipperary that helps people to find the average tip size for each restaurant. Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.

base_instruction: Compose a startup pitch on a new app called Tipperary that helps people to find the average tip size for each restaurant.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
ideal_output:
LADIES AND GENTLEMEN, THANK YOU FOR JOINING US TODAY! I AM THRILLED TO INTRODUCE YOU TO TIPPERARY, AN INNOVATIVE APP DESIGNED TO TRANSFORM THE WAY WE TIP IN RESTAURANTS.

TIPPERARY SOLVES A COMMON DILEMMA: "HOW MUCH SHOULD I TIP?" OUR APP PROVIDES USERS WITH REAL-TIME DATA ON THE AVERAGE TIP SIZE FOR EACH RESTAURANT, BASED ON PREVIOUS PATRONS’ CONTRIBUTIONS. THIS ENSURES YOU'RE NOT ONLY LEAVING A FAIR TIP BUT ALSO CONTRIBUTING TO A CULTURE OF TRANSPARENCY AND FAIRNESS.

HERE'S HOW IT WORKS: WHEN DINERS FINISH THEIR MEAL AND PAY THEIR BILL, THEY CAN INPUT THEIR TIP INTO THE APP. TIPPERARY AGGREGATES THIS DATA AND PROVIDES BOTH THE CURRENT AVERAGE TIP PERCENTAGE AND A RECOMMENDED TIP FOR NEWCOMERS TO THE RESTAURANT. THIS MAKES IT EASY TO MAKE INFORMED TIPPING DECISIONS, AVOIDING BOTH OVER- AND UNDER-TIPPING.

OUR APP IS USER-FRIENDLY, WITH A SIMPLE INTERFACE THAT PROVIDES QUICK ACCESS TO NECESSARY DATA. TIPPERARY ALSO OFFERS A GEOLOCATION FEATURE, SO YOU CAN FIND TIP AVERAGES FOR RESTAURANTS IN YOUR VICINITY, MAKING IT THE PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION.

NOT ONLY DOES TIPPERARY BENEFIT CONSUMERS, BUT IT ALSO PROVIDES VALUABLE INSIGHTS FOR RESTAURANTS, ALLOWING THEM TO SEE HOW THEIR DINERS COMPARE TO INDUSTRY NORMS AND MAKING NECESSARY ADJUSTMENTS TO IMPROVE SERVICE.

OUR MISSION IS TO FOSTER A TIPPING CULTURE THAT IS FAIR, INFORMED, AND GLOBALLY ACCESSIBLE. WITH TIPPERARY, KNOWLEDGE IS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS, AND YOUR CONTRIBUTION ENSURES THAT GREAT SERVICE IS ALWAYS REWARDED ACCURATELY.

JOIN US IN REDEFINING THE FUTURE OF TIPPING. TIPPERARY – THE APP THAT HELPS YOU GIVE WITH CONFIDENCE, EVERY TIME, EVERYWHERE. THANK YOU!

base_instruction: Compose a startup pitch on a new app called Tipperary that helps people to find the average tip size for each restaurant.
constraint1: Answer with at least 100 words.
constraint2: Answer with less than 30 words.
ideal_output:
Good afternoon, everyone. I'm excited to introduce you to Tipperary, an innovative app designed to transform the dining experience by providing transparency around tipping practices. Tipperary enables users to find the average tip size for each restaurant, offering personalized insights that empower diners to make informed decisions.

We all know that tipping expectations can vary widely from one establishment to another, creating uncertainty and sometimes stress for diners. Tipperary's user-friendly interface aggregates real-time data submitted by the community, ensuring accuracy and fostering a collaborative spirit. Our app not only highlights typical tipping ends but also reflects trends and seasonal variations.

Imagine you're booking a reservation or just leaving a meal. With a simple search, Tipperary gives you clear insights into what others typically tip, ensuring you’re in tune with customary practices at each venue. Restaurants benefit from the feedback loop too, fostering improved service and customer satisfaction.

Join us in our mission to enhance dining experiences for everyone, whether it's for locals discovering new spots or travelers exploring with confidence. With Tipperary, your dining decisions become more informed, all while contributing to a community-driven culture of transparency and etiquette. Thank you.

base_instruction: Compose a startup pitch on a new app called Tipperary that helps people to find the average tip size for each restaurant.
constraint1: Include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
constraint2: Do not include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
ideal_output:
Hello everyone,

Let me introduce you to Tipperary, the app that takes the guesswork out of tipping at restaurants. Have you ever wondered how much is just right to leave for great service? With Tipperary, you'll have the power of community-driven insights right at your fingertips. Our app aggregates thousands of user-submitted tips from countless eateries, so you’ll always know the average tip size for each restaurant you visit.

Why is this special? Because Tipperary doesn't just find the average tip; it gives you a personalized tipping experience. Users can dive into detailed profiles for many restaurants, which include real-time data, past tipping trends, and reviews on service experiences. 

Imagine walking into a restaurant for the first time and, with a quick tap on Tipperary, you not only view the average tipping rate but also discover special tipping patterns for holidays, large groups, or special service highlights. This information ensures that you always leave with a satisfied conscience, knowing you've tipped fairly.

Our app is powered by a robust network of users — people just like you, who want to foster a culture of transparency and fairness in dining. Every tip contributes to a growing database of knowledge, making the dining industry more transparent one gratuity at a time.

Join Tipperary today and become part of a movement that turns confusion into clarity, one restaurant at a time. Thank you!

base_instruction: Compose a movie plot that involves daydreaming, fist fighting, and superpowers.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.
ideal_output:
Titolo: "Sogni di Potere"

Trama: Alessandro è un semplice impiegato bancario che trascorre le sue giornate immerso nel monotono lavoro d’ufficio. Durante la pausa pranzo, però, la mente di Alessandro vaga in mondi fantastici dove è un eroe dotato di straordinari superpoteri. Nei suoi vividi sogni ad occhi aperti, combatte contro nemici potentissimi e salva la città dalle minacce più incredibili.

Una sera, mentre torna a casa, Alessandro si imbatte in una rissa tra bande. Inizia a sentirsi colpito da una strana energia e, quando un pugno sta per raggiungerlo, scopre di poterlo deviare con la sola forza della mente. Realizza di aver acquisito davvero i poteri del suo alter ego immaginario. Comincia così un viaggio in cui Alessandro deve imparare a controllare le sue nuove abilità, rendendo realtà le sue fantasie di diventare un supereroe.

Tuttavia, un'organizzazione segreta interessata a sfruttare i suoi poteri inizia a dargli la caccia. Alessandro deve lottare tra il mondo reale e i suoi sogni; con il supporto della sua migliore amica Giulia, che è l'unica a conoscere il suo segreto, affronta nemici sempre più forti in una serie di combattimenti mozzafiato.

Mentre i confini tra realtà e immaginazione si fanno più labili, Alessandro comprende che per difendere il suo mondo dovrà affrontare i suoi timori interiori e imparare a fidarsi delle sue nuove capacità. "Sogni di Potere" è una storia di coraggio, amicizia e la scoperta del vero potenziale che giace nascosto dentro di noi.

input_message.content: You must always follow this constraint: Your entire response should be in Italian language, no other language is allowed.
Compose a movie plot that involves daydreaming, fist fighting, and superpowers. Your entire response should be in Spanish language, no other language is allowed.

base_instruction: Compose a movie plot that involves daydreaming, fist fighting, and superpowers.
constraint1: Your entire response should be in English, and in all capital letters.
constraint2: Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.
ideal_output:
IN THE SMALL TOWN OF MEADOWSPRING, JAKE REYNOLDS, A QUIET HIGH SCHOOL STUDENT WITH A WILD IMAGINATION, OFTEN ESCAPES REALITY THROUGH HIS VIVID DAYDREAMS. BULLIED AT SCHOOL AND MISUNDERSTOOD AT HOME, JAKE IMAGINES HIMSELF AS A SUPERHERO WITH POWERS BEYOND COMPREHENSION. HIS FANTASY LIFE BECOMES A WAY TO COPE WITH HIS DAILY STRUGGLES.

ONE DAY, AFTER A PARTICULARLY TOUGH ENCOUNTER WITH LOCAL BULLY MARCUS, JAKE ENTERS INTO AN EXTENDED DAYDREAM WHERE THE TOWN IS UNDER THREAT FROM A SHADOWY ORGANIZATION LED BY THE SINISTER DR. ECLIPSE. IN JAKE'S DAYDREAM, EVERYONE IN MEADOWSPRING HAS BEEN GRANTED SUPERPOWERS, BUT ONLY HE POSSESSES THE ANCIENT ART OF "AURA FIST" - A MYSTICAL FIGHTING STYLE THAT CHANNELS INNER STRENGTH INTO PHYSICAL FORM.

AS THE DREAM UNFOLDS, JAKE FINDS HIMSELF LEADING A RAGTAG GROUP OF POWERED INDIVIDUALS, FACING FIERCE BATTLES TO DEFEND THEIR TOWN AND LEARNING TO HARNESS HIS OWN AURA FIST SKILLS. EACH FIGHT BRINGS HIM CLOSER TO UNDERSTANDING HIS TRUE POTENTIAL AND BELIEVING IN HIMSELF.

IN A CLIMACTIC SHOWDOWN, JAKE'S DAYDREAM WORLD COLLIDES WITH REALITY WHEN HE INTERVENES IN A SCHOOL FIGHT INVOLVING HIS FRIENDS, UNINTENTIONALLY UNLEASHING A STRANGE POWER FROM WITHIN. THE LINE BETWEEN HIS FANTASY AND REALITY BLURS AS JAKE REALIZES THAT HE MIGHT POSSESS MORE THAN JUST A VIVID IMAGINATION.

WITH HIS NEWFOUND ABILITY, JAKE CONFRONTS MARCUS AND INSPIRES HIS FRIENDS TO STAND UP TO BULLYING, DESTROYING THE NOTION THAT THEY ARE POWERLESS IN THE REAL WORLD. AS THE TOWN COMES TOGETHER, JAKE LEARNS THAT TRUE SUPERPOWERS LIE IN COURAGE, FRIENDSHIP, AND SELF-BELIEF.

Compose a movie plot that involves daydreaming, fist fighting, and superpowers. Your entire response should be in English, and in all lowercase letters.

base_instruction: Compose a movie plot that involves daydreaming, fist fighting, and superpowers.
constraint1: Answer with at least 100 words.
constraint2: Answer with less than 30 words.
ideal_output:
In the bustling city of Metropolia, high school senior Jake Daniels finds himself escaping the drudgery of daily life through vivid daydreams where he envisions himself as a superhero with extraordinary powers. These daydreams are triggered whenever he faces the real-world stress of bullies and the challenges of adolescence. One day, after a run-in with the notorious school bully, Brock, Jake discovers that his daydreams manifest into reality. During an altercation with Brock, Jake accidentally unleashes a burst of telekinetic energy, sparking a series of unintentional fist fights as other students with latent abilities are also awakened. 

As Jake struggles to control his newfound powers, he learns that daydreaming is the key to mastering them. United by their abilities, Jake and his friends form a clandestine group to harness their powers for good. However, their mission takes a dramatic turn when a mysterious, power-hungry antagonist surfaces, determined to exploit their abilities for sinister purposes. 

Jake's vivid imagination becomes his greatest asset, allowing him to foresee and outmaneuver threats. The film culminates in an epic showdown where Jake must translate his daydreams into reality, fighting to protect his friends and their city from falling into chaos. Amid the battle, Jake learns that true strength lies not just in superpowers, but in resilience, camaraderie, and the courage to dream.

base_instruction: Compose a movie plot that involves daydreaming, fist fighting, and superpowers.
constraint1: Include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
constraint2: Do not include keywords ['many', 'special'] in the response.
ideal_output:
Title: "The Dream Warriors"

Plot:

In the bustling city of Mayaopolis, a young, reserved artist named Leo discovers that his vivid daydreams are more than just figments of his imagination. While Leo spends many hours in his art studio, he often drifts into fantastical worlds where he slays dragons and scales impenetrable fortresses. One day, during an intense daydream, Leo realizes he possesses countless superpowers, including the ability to manipulate time and control elements, but only within his dream realm.

As these daydreams become more frequent and intense, Leo stumbles upon a hidden truth: a special force within him is slowly breaking the boundary between dreams and reality. Struggling to balance normal life and his newfound abilities, Leo realizes he's not the only one affected. Others with similar powers—The Dream Warriors—begin to surface in his city, each drawn to a mysterious force threatening the fabric of reality.

However, the power of their dreams comes with a cost. Whenever they unlock their special abilities, they inadvertently release destructive dream entities into the real world. These entities, born out of fear and chaos, result in many violent conflicts involving intense fist fights and battles throughout the city.

As the dream entities grow stronger, Leo must unite with the Dream Warriors to control their powers. With these warriors, including a telekinetic martial artist and a foresightful street fighter, Leo embarks on a mission to discover the source of their powers and to seal the rift between the realms before it's too late.

In this thrilling adventure, daydreams become reality, and ordinary individuals with many untapped powers become humankind's last hope. Through teamwork and friendship, they learn that unlocking their potential will turn their ordinary visions into something extraordinarily special.
